description: A fast messaging app designed to make conversations simple and effortless Messages is an open source replacement to the stock messaging app. It is a continuation of QUIK ## Features - Intuitive UI - Scheduled Messages - Message Backup - Message Blocking and Archiving - Voice Messages - Attachments of any type of file - Message Sorting - Delayed Sending - Message Filtering - Automatic OTP Detection You can chat with the community over at @Pvot_OS:Telegram
